#DefundThePolice: A Thread

Wherever the cops go, they show up with two friends: a badge & a gun

A badge is a symbol of authority to enforce laws & mediate disputes.

Guns, on the other hand, don't solve many problems. They really only do one thing well: kill.
#BlackLivesMatter
